sentences.en: Clutch the Bear is a good job as a mascot.

sentences.en: Cobi is the mascot of 1992 Olympic Summer Games in Barcelona, Spain.

sentences.en: His little son is the mascot for the local football team.

sentences.en: Meanwhile he is the honour member and mascot of King Guard.

sentences.en: The longhorn is the Texas mascot and a passion of the family.

sentences.en: The mascot for the Fifth China Farmers'Games is a cute swallow.

sentences.en: the official mascot of the 2002 World Cup
The team's mascot is a giant swan.

sentences.en: We had a panda as our mascot.

sentences.en: We might as well be in that cage with the team mascot.
sentences.cn: 我们不如和我们队的吉祥物一起呆在笼子里.

sentences.en: You'll see your team cheerleaders and mascot performing new animations as well.
sentences.cn: 你会看到啦啦队队长跟吉祥物也都会有全新的动作.

trans.tran_en: an animal or toy, or a person dressed as an animal, that represents a team or organization, and is thought to bring them good luck
